channel.title: Comments for page "Worldwide Dance Party!"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Worldwide Dance Party!"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: @palu, I'm pretty sure the higher the bonus you have, the more often you get +1. I'm at about 15% right now and I've gotten +1 for 2 or 3 months in a row now, possibly even more

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I have 1% for about half a year or even 2/3, guys :) Note about higher chance in this looks fun for me :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: AKA the RNG decides when you get higher than 1 or not.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: i have confirmed that just because you do good one month, you'll do better the next DOES NOT mean you'll get higher than 1% the next subsequent month. I have been doing this every 11th, and i have yet to get to 20.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
So this is apparently the max:

Worldwide Dance Party!

You all move to the beat, having a great time, and when you all pump your fist in the air at the end (with a resounding "Osu!"), you swear you hear the crack of thunder far away.

Flipper glances over his shoulder (fin? dorsal? whatever..) at you, but when you meet his gaze, he faces forward once again..

Max Rhythm Ability!< +200 Stamina
Total Rhythm Determination Ability: +20

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Probably in the 20-25 range. Which makes sense considering most everything that gives a bonus for Wkai is in that same range, and with Something Good that doubles to 50% at the top end- meaning it gives a 25% bonus to WKai damage, which is in range for what a kaiju drop gives as a bonus.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: In the Q&A, 11 said that "many" people have reached the limit by now. So, can someone tell us what it is?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: According to Word of God (or, more specifically, the BillyClub Q&A), the amount you get is, and I quote: "random, but if you do bad one month you'll do good the next"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: no. i dont even have terri for one account, but i got it

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Just wondering, is it confirmed that the bonus is completely random? I notice the text mentions Flipper and Terri, and I was wondering if perhaps there is a bonus for either having them in team, or hanging out with them. Sadly, I didn't think of this till after I used it today, or I would have tried.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: That's exactly what it is. A permanent, looping, monthly-increasing damage bonus against WorldKai.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: i noticed when i went after the world kai after getting the rhythm bonus that it gave me a +3% damage bonus (i got a +3 bonus for reference sakes) however it may be due to the fact that I'm legacy. confirm or deny anybody?

item.title: About the Reference.
item.content:encoded: Oh god, where does the 'Osu' Reference, for the life of me i can't remember.
